Configuration.Name: p5_8m_BIGSOURCE_central_apx10_7A_SFON
Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 7 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 7200 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'p5' sics.set('/instrument/flipper/set_flip_on', 1) #config.apx = -72 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 91.87 config.beamcenterz = 95.57 config.drive()
